title: Fighting game
summary: A fighting game (also known as versus fighting game) is a video game genre that involve combat between pairs of fighters  with game elements such as blocking, grappling, counter-attacking, and chaining attacks together into "combos". Games usually display on-screen fighters from a side view, even 3D fighting games play largely within a 2D plane of motion includes sidestepping. This includes close combat and long range combat.
